doc.title: Links with different domain names
doc.excludeDomains: Add domain names to be excluded. Only one domain name can be added at a time.
doc.description: This configuration is triggered when the domain name is different.

example.domain: You can add a domain name, such as {{url}}, to exclude the entire domain name.
example.url: You can exclude specific links by adding a link, such as {{url}}.
example.glob: You can add a {{glob}} pattern, such as {{minimatch}}, for fuzzy matching.
